languages.text: "И саги о них будут звучать в чертоге бессмертных, вселяя отвагу в сердца молодых!"
"And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"
languages.original_text: "И саги о них будут звучать в чертоге бессмертных, вселяя отвагу в сердца молодых!"

traits.locale_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “而他们的史诗将在不朽的殿堂里传唱，在幼狼心中播下勇气的种子！”
languages.original_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"

traits.locale_text: “而他们的史诗将在不朽的殿堂里传唱，在幼狼心中播下勇气的种子！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Y sus sagas resonarán en el salón de los inmortales, inspirando valor a los jóvenes!».
languages.original_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y sus sagas resonarán en el salón de los inmortales, inspirando valor a los jóvenes!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「そして彼らのサーガは不死の広間で歌われ、若人の心に勇気を植え付けるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"

traits.locale_text: 「そして彼らのサーガは不死の広間で歌われ、若人の心に勇気を植え付けるだろう！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Und ihre Sagen werden in den Hallen der Unsterblichen gesungen werden und Tapferkeit in den Herzen der Jugend säen!"
languages.original_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"

traits.locale_text: "Und ihre Sagen werden in den Hallen der Unsterblichen gesungen werden und Tapferkeit in den Herzen der Jugend säen!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Et leurs sagas seront chantées dans la salle des immortels pour remplir de bravoure les cœurs des plus jeunes ! »
languages.original_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"

traits.locale_text: « Et leurs sagas seront chantées dans la salle des immortels pour remplir de bravoure les cœurs des plus jeunes ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"

languages.text: "Destanları ölümsüzlerin salonlarına yankılanacak, isimleri binlerce yıl sonra bile hatırlanacak."
languages.original_text: "And their sagas will be sung in the hall of the immortals, sowing valour in the hearts of the young!"

traits.locale_text: "Destanları ölümsüzlerin salonlarına yankılanacak ve isimleri binlerce yıl sonra bile hatırlanacak."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
